text: G. Kumaresan (40), a diesel mechanic in Golden Rock Railway Workshop here, was electrocuted in his house at Ponmalai railway colony here on Sunday. Police said Kumaresan took bath and went to dry clothes in a wire when he suffered electric shock since power passed through it due to leak. He was getting to ready to leave for Tirunelveli. Sources said residents of some other houses also felt shock apparently due to power leak.
title: Railway employee electrocuted
